amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that all applicants for a drilling permit under a lease issued pursuant to the bill would have to submit a worst-case scenario oil spill containment and clean-up plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-74 to require that all applicants for a drilling permit under a lease issued under H.R. 1231 would have to submit a worst-case scenario oil spill containment and clean-up plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 315).
